local_intent: Compute grasp pose for white_plate (result_key=white_plate_grasp), approach and pick it, verify grasp stability, then detect red_plate and place by lowering until contact, release, and retreat.
assumptions: white_plate and red_plate remain visible/reachable during execution
gripper is operational and can open/close to specified widths
computed grasp pose is usable by ApproachAndAlign and Pick
coherence_with_global: Preserves the global plan: open gripper, perceive white plate, compute top grasp, pick, perceive red plate, lower to contact, release, and retreat. Adds limited retries for perception and a grasp-stability check.
